text: oneulnal neohuiege joh-eun geosdeul-iheolagdoeeoss-euni seongseoleul bad-eun jadeul-ui eumsig-i heolagdoeeossgo ttohan neohuiui eumsigdo geudeul-ege heolagdoeeoss-eumyeo mid eum-i ganghan sungyeolhan yeoseongdeul-imyeo geu dae ijeon-e seongseoleul bad-eunjadeul-ui yeo seongdeuldo neohuiga geunyeodeul-ege jicham geum-eul jibulhago geudeulgwa hwamoghage salttaeneun heolagdoen geos-igeoneul gan-eum-eul haeseodo anhdoemyeo naeyeon-ui cheoleul dueo seodo anidoenani mid-eum-eul bujeonghaneun janeun nugudeun geuui il-i gongheohage doemyeo naeseeseo sonsiljaga doenila
